name: css-column-rule-color
description: Css module of single purpose classes for column rule color

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-column-rule-color.css > css/css-column-rule-color.css && tachyons src/css-column-rule-color.css --minify > css/css-column-rule-color.min.css && tachyons src/css-column-rule-color.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
